name: Eternal Kinstone

additionalTooltips.title: Charged Echoes
additionalTooltips.description:
Add [corrupt] by playing [infused] cards. The Wurmkin use [corrupt] to power spells and abilities.

[corrupt] can exceed [emptycorrupt] but excess [corrupt] will be removed at end of turn.

cardLoreTooltips: Once the Wurmkin have completed their kinstone, they commit that knowledge to a cairn. “Truth, Forever” as they put it. Do you think they account for the truths that rip you open inside? No, they put a stone in a crypt for all to see and to know. For all eternity, damn the consequences. Some things are best left forgotten.
